com.zhangmagle.controller

类 DepartmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhangmagle.controller.DepartmentController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/deparment")
public class DepartmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Providing RESTful API for department operations, including 1. create a sub-department according to an existed department 2. Query all department information 3. query all sub-departments of a department 4. delete a department 5. update information of a department 6. query parent department of another
    作者:
    my
